CustomField.formula: IF( AND( SBQQ__Product__r.RecordType.Name = "Industrial Washing Machine", OR( ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Product__r.Heating_type__c, "Dual (Electric & Steam)"), ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Product__r.Heating_type__c, "Steam") ) ), SBQQ__Quantity__c * SBQQ__Product__r.Capacity__c, 0 )
CustomField.label: Total Steam Required in Kg/hr
